CHAUNCEY HAWKINS.
HAUNCEY HAWKINS is a name familiar to most of the boys of this
C country, being the author of the well known “Ned Brewster” series of

boys’ books. He has also written several other books which are important
contributions to our American literature.

Hawkins. however; is not only widely known as an author and lecturer, but |. ea
rretaget one of the most adventurous and successful wild game photographers agree

in America. He is bringing to Chautauqua a great lecture; “Wild Hearts and |
svight Eyes of Our Nerthern Woods,” illustrated with some of his wonderfui
pictures taken in the great solituces of the North.
